comments.raw_text:
Caused by a case [in]sensitive OS.

347 scripts uses "Menu.html" (uppercase M), while just 1 file (.\Testopia\extensions\Testopia\extjs\examples\data.js) uses menu.html (lowercase m)

PANIC!!!
When un-tar'ing files, the first file copied is Menu.html (that used in most scripts), and is replaced by a shorter file (in size and functionality)
comments.author: mauricio_herrera@unicomer.com
